title: Opinion: Why Matteo Jorgenson Is the Tour de France Dark Horse American Fans Should Rally Around
content:
Tour de Hoody: Don't count Matteo Jorgenson out as a podium outsider, and it would be a mistake to say that he cannot win this Tour de France.

Read the full article at Opinion: Why Matteo Jorgenson Is the Tour de France Dark Horse American Fans Should Rally Around on Velo.
author: ahood
